long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SwiftRelay - The Very First and #1 Amazon Relay Auto Booker

Designed specifically for dispatchers using the Amazon Relay load board, SwiftRelay revolutionizes how you manage and book loads. As the first auto booker for Amazon Relay loads, SwiftRelay combines automation, efficiency, and real-time insights to simplify your workflow and help you stay ahead of the competition.

Try It For Free! 

And here's the game-changer: SwiftRelay is the only extension that provides the Speed Optimizer feature, which increases auto booking speed by an astounding 2000%, giving you a massive edge over competitors.

Why Choose SwiftRelay?
✔️ One-Click Load Booking: Instantly secure the best Amazon Relay loads with just one click—no delays, no hassle.
✔️ Speed Optimizer: Boost auto booking speeds by up to 2000%, ensuring you never miss out on the best loads.
✔️ Auto Booker & Refresher: Automate load booking and refreshing, giving you more time to focus on scaling your business.
✔️ Competitor Insights: View loads booked by competitors directly on the load board, empowering you to make smarter decisions.
✔️ Real-Time Load Stats: Access live statistics on new loads, rates, and trends to maximize your earnings and stay competitive.
✔️ Customizable Filters: Set your preferences for payout rates, mileage, stops, and exclude states to optimize routes and bookings.
✔️ Google Maps Integration: Plan your trips with pre-loaded routes, including pickup and drop-off locations, for smarter, faster deliveries.
✔️ Multi-Tab & Multi-Window Support: Manage multiple tabs and windows simultaneously to control all operations.
✔️ User-Friendly Interface: An intuitive design makes it easy for dispatchers and truckers of all experience levels to get started.

How to Get Started:
1.	Download SwiftRelay from the Chrome Web Store.
2.	Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension.
3.	Customize your settings to fit your dispatch needs.
4.	Start booking Amazon Relay loads faster and smarter!

Why SwiftRelay?
SwiftRelay is the pioneer in Amazon Relay load automation. With its unique Speed Optimizer, comprehensive auto-booking tools, and real-time insights, it's not just a tool—it's your partner in simplifying dispatch tasks, reducing manual work, and maximizing profits.

Try SwiftRelay today and see the difference from your very first load!
